item.title: Quickly install openjdk-8-jre-headless on Debian without apt-get
item.description: Manually installation wget https://github.com/ojdkbuild/contrib_jdk8u-ci/releases/download/jdk8u212-b04/jdk-8u212-ojdkbuild-linux-x64.zip \ -O /tmp/jdk-8u212-ojdkbuild-linux-x64.zip unzip /tmp/jdk-8u212-ojdkbuild-linux-x64.zip /usr/lib/jvm/ rm /tmp/jdk-8u212-ojdkbuild-linux-x64.zip Add PATH to your .bashrc export PATH=$PATH:/usr/lib/jvm/jdk-8u212-ojdkbuild-linux-x64/jre/bin Done
